mapper.select: select permission_value from acl_permission where is_deleted = 0

select p.permission_value from acl_user_role ur inner join acl_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join acl_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0
